verses.verse: I hear the Savior say, "Thy strength indeed is small; Child of weakness, watch and pray, Find in Me thine all in all."
Lord, now indeed I find Thy power, and Thine alone, Can change the leper's spots, And melt the heart of stone.
Since nothing good have I Whereby Thy grace to claim, I'll wash my garment white In the blood of Calvary's Lamb.
And when before the throne I stand in Him complete, I'll lay my trophies down, All down at Jesus' feet.
